column7: Overview of contemporary dance from the United States, Canada, and Europe focusing on the current works of significant emerging and established choreographers working in the field today. 1 undergraduate hour. 1 graduate hour. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated to a maximum of 4 hours.
